author: dan131riley
body: This modifies RootEmbeddedFileSequence to have basically the same settings for the ROOT TTreeCache as the primary input file, defaulting to having the cache on.  RootEmbeddedFileSequence is only used by the MixingModule, so this change will turn on caching for the MixingModule inputs without affecting any other use cases.
title: Use TTreeCache for RootEmbeddedFileSequence
